cons_3d.stdout: Wrote docs/conservation_check_3d.json: Laplacian OK=True, Varying-w OK=True

explanations.overall: Overall passes when all required checks pass. Optional artifacts (ledger snapshot, uncertainties) do not gate pass/fail.
explanations.gates: Parity-gate combinatorics: verifies the 9-gate schedule blocks |B|=46 of 1024 ticks (S=489/512) by brute force and analytically.
explanations.growth_json: Structure growth demo: docs/demo_results.json exists and contains growth results and grid.
explanations.lensing_json: Lensing demo: docs/lensing_results.json exists and contains lensing rows and grid.
explanations.masses_json: Mass/mixing snapshot: docs/masses_snapshot.json exists and includes charged_leptons, quarks, bosons, CKM, PMNS, and neutrinos.
explanations.cons_2d_const: 2D conservation (constant w=1): discrete Laplacian test passes with negligible residuals.
explanations.cons_2d_var: 2D conservation (varying w): discrete divergence theorem (source minus flux) agrees to numerical precision.
explanations.cons_3d: 3D conservation: both constant-w Laplacian and varying-w divergence checks pass on a voxel cube.
explanations.ilg_limits: ILG limits: numeric probes confirm Newtonian recovery (mu→1) and controlled deep-regime behavior; sweep serialized to docs/ilg_limit_checks.json.
explanations.metrics: Aggregated residual metrics computed and badges derived.
explanations.uncertainties: Presence/shape of docs/masses_uncertainties.json; values may be zero until measured/model uncertainties are provided.
explanations.z_in_grids: Asserts each (a,k) grid cell reports redshift z=1/a−1 for clarity.

gates.purpose: Verify parity-gate combinatorics: |B|=46 blocked ticks → S=489/512 (no knobs).
gates.method: Brute-force enumeration plus inclusion–exclusion analytic count over the 1024-tick schedule.
gates.meaning: Fixes suppression S and derived β=(T·N_gates)/S used consistently in growth and lensing.

ilg_limits.purpose: Confirm ILG kernel recovers Newtonian (μ→1) and has controlled deep-regime behavior.
ilg_limits.method: Numerical probes over (a,k) with sweep serialized to docs/ilg_limit_checks.json.
ilg_limits.meaning: Shows the same kernel behaves correctly across regimes; prerequisite for cosmology reuse.

growth_json.purpose: Ensure structure-growth export is present and well-formed.
growth_json.method: Schema check for docs/demo_results.json with required keys.
growth_json.meaning: Guarantees reproducible inputs for the audit page and downstream analysis.

lensing_json.purpose: Ensure lensing export is present and well-formed.
lensing_json.method: Schema check for docs/lensing_results.json with required keys.
lensing_json.meaning: Guarantees reproducible inputs for the audit page and downstream analysis.

cons_2d_const.purpose: Check discrete Laplacian/Poisson behavior on a 2D grid (constant w=1).
cons_2d_const.meaning: Validates core conservation laws in a simple controlled setting.

cons_2d_var.purpose: Verify discrete divergence theorem with varying w in 2D.
cons_2d_var.method: Run conservation_check_varying_w.py and compare source vs flux.
cons_2d_var.meaning: Confirms numerical soundness of variable-kernel flux bookkeeping.

cons_3d.purpose: Validate 3D Laplacian and varying-w divergence checks on a voxel cube.
cons_3d.method: Run conservation_check_3d.py and parse reported pass/fail.
cons_3d.result: Wrote docs/conservation_check_3d.json: Laplacian OK=True, Varying-w OK=True
cons_3d.meaning: Extends conservation verification to the 3D lattice used by the framework.

masses_json.purpose: Ensure mass/mixing snapshot export contains all sectors.
masses_json.meaning: Provides reproducible mass ratio tables used by the audit page.

metrics.purpose: Aggregate domain residual metrics and derive badges.
metrics.meaning: Summarizes fit-free residuals for mass/cosmology outputs.

uncertainties.method: Check docs/masses_uncertainties.json exists and has expected keys.
uncertainties.meaning: Documentation quality; does not gate evidence checks.

z_in_grids.purpose: Require redshift z to be included in all grid rows for clarity.

criteria: No unresolved P0 proof obligations remain
verdict.note: Evidence checks passing does not assert truth; vouching requires all P0 items resolved.
